[![](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/accepts.svg?maxAge=3600)](https://pypi.org/project/accepts/)[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-Unlicense-blue.svg?longCache=True)](https://unlicense.org/)### Installation```bash$ [sudo] pip install accepts```#### Features*support **multiple types** argument*support **None** argument*human readable detailed exception message#### Examples```python>>> from accepts import accepts>>> @accepts(int)def inc(value):return value+1>>> inc(1) # ok# multiple types>>> @accepts((int,float))>>> inc(1.5) # ok>>> inc("string")TypeError: inc() argument #0 is not instance of (, )# None>>> @accepts((int,float,type(None)))```
